trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Buford
There were no other sightings in Buford on or around March 6th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside of my house in a rural area with my son when I saw a figure with pulsating lights appear from the south. After hovering for a few minutes it turned around and went right back from the direction it came. I didnt see anything come or go but it was dark out tonight and i will be going back early tomorrow to see if i notice anything out in the fields.
